nodes.title: Home
nodes.purpose: Display the store homepage with featured products
nodes.userGoal: Discover new products and access the catalog
nodes.userActionExpected: Browse sections or click on a featured product
nodes.nextVisibleOutcome: Navigation to the product catalog or opening of the product detail page

nodes.title: Hero Banner
nodes.purpose: Highlight a promotion or a featured product

nodes.title: Featured Products
nodes.purpose: Display a selection of featured products
nodes.userActionExpected: Click on a product to view its details

nodes.title: Categories
nodes.purpose: Provide quick access to different product categories

nodes.title: Product Catalog
nodes.purpose: Display the complete list of available products
nodes.userGoal: Find a product to purchase by browsing or filtering the catalog
nodes.userActionExpected: Use filters and then select a product
nodes.nextVisibleOutcome: Display of the selected product detail page

nodes.title: Product Catalog - Empty
nodes.purpose: Display the catalog when no products match the criteria
nodes.userGoal: Find products despite no results being available
nodes.blockingReason: No products match the selected filters
nodes.nextVisibleOutcome: Filter modification or return to the homepage

nodes.title: Search Filters
nodes.purpose: Allow filtering products by category, price, or rating
nodes.userActionExpected: Select one or more filters to refine the search

nodes.title: Product Grid
nodes.purpose: Display products in a grid with image and price
nodes.userActionExpected: Click on a product card to view details

nodes.title: Product Detail
nodes.purpose: Display all detailed information about a product
nodes.userGoal: Review product details to decide whether to purchase
nodes.userActionExpected: Read information, review ratings, then add to cart
nodes.nextVisibleOutcome: Opening of the add-to-cart confirmation modal

nodes.title: Image Gallery
nodes.purpose: Display product photos from different angles

nodes.title: Product Information
nodes.purpose: Display name, price, description, stock, and add-to-cart button
nodes.userActionExpected: Read information and click 'Add to cart'

nodes.title: Customer Reviews
nodes.purpose: Display reviews and ratings left by other customers

nodes.title: Cart
nodes.purpose: Display items added to the cart and the order summary
nodes.userGoal: Review cart contents before placing an order
nodes.userActionExpected: Check items, adjust quantities, then proceed

nodes.title: Cart - Empty
nodes.purpose: Inform the user that the cart is empty
nodes.blockingReason: No items have been added to the cart
nodes.nextVisibleOutcome: Return to the product catalog to add items

nodes.title: Cart Items
nodes.purpose: List added products with image, price, and quantity

nodes.title: Order Summary
nodes.purpose: Display total amount and checkout button

nodes.title: Checkout
nodes.purpose: Allow entry of shipping and payment information
nodes.userGoal: Complete the purchase by providing required information
nodes.userActionExpected: Fill in forms step by step and confirm

nodes.title: Shipping
nodes.purpose: Enter the shipping address

nodes.title: Payment
nodes.purpose: Enter payment information

nodes.title: Review
nodes.purpose: Review all information before final confirmation

nodes.title: Order Confirmed
nodes.purpose: Confirm that the order has been successfully placed
nodes.nextVisibleOutcome: Return to the homepage or view orders

nodes.title: My Account
nodes.purpose: Manage personal information and view order history
nodes.userGoal: View orders or update profile information

nodes.title: Profile
nodes.purpose: Update personal information

nodes.title: My Orders
nodes.purpose: Display the history of past orders

nodes.title: Settings
nodes.purpose: Manage notification and security preferences

nodes.title: Login
nodes.purpose: Allow the user to log into their account
nodes.userActionExpected: Enter email and password and submit
nodes.nextVisibleOutcome: Redirection to the account or closing of the modal

nodes.title: Register
nodes.purpose: Allow creation of a new account
nodes.userGoal: Create an account to access services
nodes.userActionExpected: Fill in the registration form and submit

nodes.title: Added to Cart
nodes.purpose: Confirm that a product has been added to the cart
nodes.nextVisibleOutcome: Choice between continuing shopping or viewing the cart

nodes.title: Confirm Deletion
nodes.purpose: Ask for confirmation before removing an item from the cart

meta.author: Product Team
meta.appDescription: Complete e-commerce application with product, cart, and checkout management
